com.snamp.connectors

Class AbstractManagementConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snamp.connectors.AbstractManagementConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ManagementConnector, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ManagementConnectorBean

    public abstract class AbstractManagementConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ManagementConnector
    Represents an abstract class for building custom management connectors.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Roman Sakno
